dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 657 IH: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New York.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Meng introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New York.

section.header: Single, unique ZIP Code for Glendale, New York
section.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this section, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code applicable to the area encompassing only Glendale, New York.
